# mastodon_account (Data Source)

Account data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "mastodon_account" "example" {
  username = "@tedivm@hachyderm.io"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `username` (String) Account configurable attribute

### Read-Only

- `bot` (Boolean)
- `display_name` (String)
- `id` (String) Account identifier
- `locked` (Boolean)
- `note` (String)
